headline: GOP Senate nominees Vance of Ohio and Oz of Pennsylvania set to rally with Trump
author: Juliegrace Brufke
sentences: The McCormick campaign has also touted his support of Trump and dismissed the need for his endorsement, highlighting his backing from Trump administration alumni including former White House counselor Kellyanne Conway and former Secretary of State Mike Pompeo.
